detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Captain’s cap in a felted wool blend with buttons at the sides, braiding at the front and covered elastication at the back. Patterned satin lining.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Relaxed-fit sweater vest in a soft rib knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the sweater vest is recycled.
Top in block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Set with a bra top and pair of briefs in soft jersey with a contrasting colour lace trim. Top with a V-neck and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the cups. Briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt woven in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit ‒ a fitted style with shaping seams at the back.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 49-57 cm.
Cardigan in soft jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a shawl collar, long sleeves, gathered yoke at the back and no buttons.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length dress in a silk blend with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Tailored, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric. Concealed elastication at the waist and a concealed zip and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at one side. Side pockets with decorative metal studs, fake welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidery detail on the chest, and a rounded hem.
Longer, metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a horseshoe decorated with rhinestones. Adjustable length.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Belt in grained imitation leather with an adjustable fastening and a detachable round mini-bag with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 2x10 cm. Width of belt 2 cm.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined wrapover hood, high wrapover slits at the sides and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short, fitted skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 12 cm.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in patterned jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication, a seam centre front and slit at the hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Straight-style jumper in washed, rib-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, sleeveless V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces at the front.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.

Slim-fit, 5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, an embroidered motif on one leg and narrow hems.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, ribbed jersey with a racer back.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings with sparkly stones. Diameter approx. 4 cm, length approx. 5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back, long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Wedge-heel sandals with a decorative bow at the front, an ankle strap with an adjustable fastener and braided jute trims around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 13 cm.
Shorts in a patterned weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats and decorative buttons at the front.
Jumper in a cotton knit with a funnel collar with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elastic hem with hooks and eyes at the back.
Hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with decorative flounces at the top.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Bucket hat in a textured weave. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey sewn in a double layer with openings in the lower layer for easier nursing access.
Short top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long, printed sleeves.

prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Longer cardigan in an airy, pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Short twill dungaree dress with shoulder straps that fasten with metal eyelets at the top, a chest pocket and front and back pockets. Unlined.

Wide trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with a high waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and ties at the hem.
Short skirt in patterned chiffon with a wide flounce at the top and jersey ribbing for optimum fit. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a bouclé knit with a roll-edge neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a sheen. Sweetheart neckline, pleats at the top, and 3/4-length sleeves with wrapover shoulders and a layered organza detail on the inside to shape and create volume. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a seam under the bust, a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and a fitted skirt with gathers at the sides and pleats. Satin lining.
Long earrings that are shaped like a flower at the top with beads and plastic sequins.
Trousers in superstretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined bodice and a short inner skirt.
Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with a tie detail at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw with an adjustable cord that goes half way around the hat and under the chin.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
